_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Luna Multiplayer
author: b.anglin@terrahost.io
description:
Kerbal Space Program Luna Multiplayer Server
http://lunamultiplayer.com/

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash 
apt-get -y update
apt-get -y install curl unzip

cd /tmp
curl -sSLO https://github.com/LunaMultiplayer/LunaMultiplayer/releases/download/${LMP_VERSION}/LunaMultiplayer-Release.zip
unzip LunaMultiplayer-Release -d /tmp
rm -rf LMPClient LMP\ Readme.txt
cp -Rf /tmp/LMPServer/* /mnt/server

export HOME=/mnt/server
mkdir -p /mnt/server/{Config,Universe,Plugins,logs}
